for guidance about your request for their approval.

mailbox, giving EOUSA a heads up & asking 
Mention that you will send the airfare shortly, as well as your intent to forward your travel authorizations to them via E2 
shortly. 
Foreign 
Travel Guidance During the COVID-19 Pandemic 
State Department Travel Advisory 
The Department of State has issued travel advisories to Level 4 (Do Not Travel) designated locations. They also advise to reconsider 
travel abroad at this time due to the impact of COVID-19. Many areas throughout the world are experiencing outbreaks and are taking 
actions that may limit traveler mobility, including quarantines and border restrictions. Even countries without reported cases of COVID-
19 are taking measures and may restrict travel without notice. Please view the Department of State's Travel Advisory Webpage 
for the 
most updated information. 
Official Passports 
Due to public health measures to limit the spread of COVID-19, effective immediately, the Department of States Special Issuance 
Agency (SIA) are only offering service to issue passports for customers with a qualified life-or-death emergency with a need to be issued 
a passport for international travel within 72 hours. SIA defines life-or-death as a serious illness, injury, or death in one's immediate family 
(e.g., parent, sibling, aunt uncle, dependent, etc.). This means official passports will not be processed during this time until further 
notice. If an employee without an official passport needs to complete essential international travel, and they have a valid tourist 
passport, they must obtain approval from the host country via email to travel in their official capacity on a tourist 
passport, and submit that approval with all of the usually required foreign travel documentation and approvals to 
Fly 
America Act 
Please 
email 
the mailbox if you have a safety related need to request an exception to the Fly America Act 
If you have any additional questions or concerns regarding this matter, please contact the RMP Travel Staff 
at

travel first. 
Thanks so much, 
Sent from my iPhone 
EFTA00032481
